description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints such as a greeting, documentation redirect, health status, and application info for the tictactoebackend service.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message to verify the service is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving URL scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check endpoint that returns 'OK'.
